instructions: Open the Photos app , then select a photo or video, or select multiple photos or videos. Tap the Share button , then tap Shared Albums. Add any comments you want, then tap Shared Album. Choose an album to add the photo or video to.
Open the Calendar app , then add an event . While entering the event details, tap Calendar, then tap Family to add the event to the family calendar.
Open the Reminders app . Tap the Family list, then tap the New Reminder button to add a reminder to the list.

Go to Settings > [ your name ] > Share My Location. Turn on Share My Location. Tap From, select the device you want to share your location from, then tap the Back button . Tap the family member you want to share your location with, then tap Share My Location. Your family member receives a message that you re sharing your location and can choose to share their location with you.
Follow the instructions that came with the device to put it in discovery mode. On iPhone, go to Settings , then tap Bluetooth. Tap the device in the Devices list to connect.
Go to Settings , then tap Bluetooth. Tap the More Info button next to the device, then tap Forget This Device.
